title: Code Blue: Murder
overview: This series tells the story of how detectives solved two vicious murders - from the first â€˜Code Blue' call to the crime scene, through to the convictions of the killers.With extraordinary access to the multidisciplinary South Wales Police operation that brought the perpetrators to justice, Code Blue: Murder delves into the anatomy of two separate murder investigations, into the killings of Katherine Smith and of Jack Williams.
